title: Editing a film: Synge's 'The Well of the saints'
creator_credit: Larry Yust and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: The principles involved in editing a film are explained, using the film version of John M. Synge’s play “THE WELL OF THE SAINTS”. The role of the editor in film production, and the purpose and result of editing, are described, and both proper and improper techniques are illustrated
